# API Test Specifications

This document defines REST APIs to be tested automatically by Codex AI.
Each API block is independent and includes expectations and test scenarios.

---

## Variables

- Name: `base_url`
  - Value: `https://qaweb360plus.360awareqa.com`

- Name: `auth_token`
  - Value: `Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..i7Yfcgufdoxq8K01Z78Sg1F0z0VPKcUq9hFfMWbjJMy5Jeb6s36yRmSfKBO-2vybeaIN70pDLa40eIhlggaC59Ej0RhXuMjVZ3sJF4mRhAZSfKbk6VesicvAXG2jUe47uF02okSFn32oA-ITQhuWSW_PzGSa4RrZi8wduXwRaCTBMr9FNsdYdRZGGdSIpoNsX_JAhpAvQKn1_pPSv9qh2En06P0t0Ez4q71UseIIvOv8CtawaiIwo9Krvrgn4o-KwhNJv807q7zxsGrUt1OHF3tmfNQOFe2ehO2PCr5jEUcGLq1Rqex_PcjuiFXv_vFjyGElKmgRJS9SLkyAZuceRQ`

## API-001: KMI Users Service

### Description

KMI Users

### Request

- Method: GET
- URL: `{{base_url}}/v2/web/odata/SEPAOrgs/SE.GetUsers`
- Headers:
  - Content-Type: `application/json`
  - Authorization: `{{auth_token}}`
- Body: None

### Expectations

- Status Code: 2xx
- Response Body: Optional

### Test Cases

| ID     | Type     | Description                | Expected                        |
|--------|----------|----------------------------|---------------------------------|
| TC-001 | Positive | Valid GET request          | Status code is in range 200â€“299 |
| TC-002 | Negative | Invalid method (GET)       | Status code is not 2xx          |
| TC-003 | Negative | Ununauthorized request     | Status code is 401              |
